params:
type
text
config
font
textAlign
color

4.text:
textDiv = div(
    {
        display: "inline-block",
        position: "absolute",
        color: color,
        left: "0px",
        top: "0px",
        font: font,
        "user-select": "none",
        "text-align": textAlign,
        "max-width": config.width + "px",
        "min-width": config.minWidth + "px",
        padding: config.padding + "px",
        lineHeight: config.lineHeight
    }
)

name: buildMulitlineDiv
